headline: In Latest EV Pullback, Ford to Share Battery Plant With Nissan
summary: Part of Ford’s flagship battery plant remains inactive as EV demand has slowed. Nissan will now use the factory to help defer tariff costs.

raw.headline: In Latest EV Pullback, Ford to Share Battery Plant With Nissan
raw.summary: Part of Ford’s flagship battery plant remains inactive as EV demand has slowed. Nissan will now use the factory to help defer tariff costs.

headline: Charged: Tesla to restart shipping Chinese parts for U.S. production
summary: Institutional investors and professional traders rely on The Fly to keep up-to-the-second on breaking news in the electric vehicle and clean energy space, as well as which stocks in these sectors that the best analysts on Wall Street are saying to buy and sell. headline: 3 Reasons Why Japan's Record Bond Yield Spike Matters

headline: General Motors Urges Lawmakers to Block EV Mandate as EV Demand Slows
summary: GM urges lawmakers to block California's strict zero-emission vehicle mandate as demand for EVs plummets.

headline: Tesla Supplier CATL Soars in HK Debut After World’s Top Listing This Year
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: CATL Soars In Hong Kong Debut
summary: Battery supplier CATL rallies on Hong Kong debut after record IPO. Taiwan's President downplays trade tensions with U.S. Delta Air Lines can sue CrowdStrike over July 2024 outage.
